content.question: Kollwitzâ€™ portrayal of the weavers is best explained as an attempt to

choices.label: inspire the authorities to repress social unrest
warn working people against the dangers of socialism
sympathetically depict ordinary people affected by social problems
instill the sufferings of common people with religious meaning

content.answer: sympathetically depict ordinary people affected by social problems

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
